PERMS_DESCRIPTION: Lets you whitelist or blacklist specific commands in the channel.
WHITELISTING_INFO: Whitelisting : Those commands will be allowed in the channel.
BLACKLISTING_INFO: Blacklisting : Only those commands will be blocked in the channel
EMBED_FOOTER: You need Manage Server permissions to configure it.
WHILISTED_NOTE: Note: To blacklist a command after whitelisting you have to disable all the whitelisted commands by using `{{customPrefix}}permission whitelist none`.
BLACKLISTED_NOTE: Note: To whitelist a command after blacklisting you have to disable all the whitelisted commands by using `{{customPrefix}}permission blacklist none`.
MENTION_COMMANDS_WHITELIST: Please mention some commands to whitelist.
WHITELISTED_COMMANDS_REMOVED: > All the whitelisted commands have been removed successfully.
BLACKLISTED_COMMANDS_EXIST: > You currently have blacklisted the commands in this channel First remove them all with `{{customPrefix}}permission blacklist none` and then try again.
WHITELIST_COMMANDS_SUCCESSFULL: The command(s) {{pushedCmds}} has been whitelisted in this channel.
MENTION_COMMANDS_BLACKLIST: > Please mention some commands to blacklist.
BLACKLISTED_COMMANDS_REMOVED: > All the blacklisted commands have been removed successfully.
WHITELISTED_COMMANDS_EXIST: > You currently have whitelisted the commands in this channel. First remove them all with `{{customPrefix}}permission whitelist none` and then try again.
BLACKLIST_COMMANDS_SUCCESSFULL: The command(s) {{pushedCmds}} has been blacklisted in this channel.
